SEARCH
Package main.java.game.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
main.java.game.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
The GameModel class represents the state of the card game, including player management, card handling, and game flow. It manages players, cards, scores, and determines when the game ends.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int numberOfCard, int numberOfPlayer, int numberOfAi, Integer difficulty)
      Constructor of GameModel for local mode.
      Parameters:
      numberOfCard - a int which represent total number of cards in game.
      numberOfPlayer - a int which represent total number of players in game.
      numberOfAi - a int which represent total number of AI in game.
      difficulty - a int which represent the difficulty of AI players.

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(int numberOfCard, LinkedList<ClientHandler> players, int numberOfAi, Integer difficulty)
      Constructor of GameModel for network mode.
      Parameters:
      numberOfCard - a int which represent total number of cards in game.
      players - a LinkedList which represent the list of current player in game.
      numberOfAi - a int which represent total number of AI in game.
      difficulty - a int which represent the difficulty of AI players.

      Parameters:

      indexCardPlayer - The index of the card to display.

    • swapCard

      public void swapCard(PlayerModel player1, int indexCard1, PlayerModel player2, int indexCard2)
      Swaps two cards between two players' decks at the specified indices.
      Parameters:
      player1 - The first player involved in the swap.
      indexCard1 - The index of the card in player1's deck to be swapped.
      player2 - The second player involved in the swap.
      indexCard2 - The index of the card in player2's deck to be swapped.

    • swapCard

      public void swapCard(int player1, int indexCard1, int player2, int indexCard2)
      Swaps two cards between two players by their game IDs.
      Parameters:
      player1 - The game ID of the first player.
      indexCard1 - The index of the card in player1's deck to be swapped.
      player2 - The game ID of the second player.
      indexCard2 - The index of the card in player2's deck to be swapped.
